title: Perfect Pan-Fried Fish
ingredients: ['2 skinless, white fish fillets, cut into large pieces', 'white pepper, to taste', 'cornflour, as needed', '1 tablespoon oil', '1 teaspoon salt or to taste', '1 tablespoon oil', '1 large carrot, sliced', '2 tablespoons water', 'Sauce', '1 teaspoon chicken stock granules', '1 teaspoon sesame oil', 'salt to taste', '1-2 teaspoons cornflour, mixed with 3 tablespoons water', '1 spring onion, finely sliced']
